meanings.sent1: She always speaks in an unmalicious way, never trying to hurt anyone's feelings.
meanings.sent2: The unmalicious puppy wagged its tail happily, showing no intention of causing harm.
meanings.sent3: The unmalicious prank involved harmless jokes and silly pranks.
meanings.sent4: Her unmalicious nature was like a gentle breeze, bringing only kindness wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The unmalicious smile on his face reassured everyone of his good intentions.

meanings.definition: Free from malice or ill will
meanings.sent1: He approached the situation with an unmalicious attitude, wanting only peace.
meanings.sent2: The unmalicious letter expressed genuine goodwill and positivity.
meanings.sent3: Their unmalicious rivalry was based on friendly competition and mutual respect.
meanings.sent4: The unmalicious sky seemed to smile down on the joyful gathering below.
meanings.sent5: The unmalicious handshake sealed their agreement with trust and sincerity.
